Deprecated List

Global exif_entry_free

Should not be called directly. Use exif_entry_ref and exif_entry_unref instead.

Global exif_tag_get_description
Use exif_tag_get_description_in_ifd instead

Global exif_tag_get_name
Use exif_tag_get_name_in_ifd instead

Global exif_tag_get_title
Use exif_tag_get_title_in_ifd instead

Global EXIF_TAG_SUBSEC_TIME
Use EXIF_TAG_SUB_SEC_TIME instead.

Global EXIF_TAG_UNKNOWN_C4A5
Use EXIF_TAG_PRINT_IMAGE_MATCHING instead.
